sentences.en: Air force units have been ordered to intensify their patrols.
sentences.cn: 空军部队奉命加强巡逻.

sentences.en: His mother’s death intensified his loneliness.
sentences.cn: 母亲的过世使他感到更加孤单。

sentences.en: In the Sunbelt states competition for land and water will intensify.
sentences.cn: 在阳光充足地带的一些州,对土地和水的争夺会很激烈.

sentences.en: In these circumstances the only solution is to intensify political training.
sentences.cn: 在此种情形下,只有加紧政治训练的一法.

sentences.en: Last suggesting our academe to intensify the research in this field.
sentences.cn: 从而建议我国学术界应加强这一领域的学术研究.

sentences.en: That could weigh on growth, and intensify frictions over trade.
sentences.cn: 这可能会拖累经济增长, 并加剧贸易摩擦.

sentences.en: The admission will intensify doubts about the election result.
sentences.cn: 阿巴斯的承认将加深人们对选举结果的怀疑.

sentences.en: The conflict is almost bound to intensify.
The group's move will intensify competition in the fast - growing Chinese PC market.
sentences.cn: 宏碁此举将加剧中国快速增长的个人电脑市场的竞争.

sentences.en: They are a means by which you develop trust and intensify connection.
sentences.cn: 这是产生信任、加深默契的关键.

sentences.en: They were ordered to intensify their patrols to protect our air space.
sentences.cn: 他们奉命加强巡逻,保卫我国的领空.

sentences.en: This complicated blame game will intensify as the Scottish elections approach.
sentences.cn: 这一错综复杂的指责游戏随着苏格兰大选的临近而愈演愈烈.

sentences.en: This could intensify the risk of a nuclear exchange.
sentences.cn: 这可能会加剧爆发核战争的危险。

sentences.en: To intensify means to increase the density and to grow stronger.
sentences.cn: 强化的手法之一就是增加它的密度,使它变得更强.

sentences.en: We must intensify our educational work among our own troops.
sentences.cn: 我们必须加强自己部队的教育工作.

sentences.en: We take terrorism seriously and will intensify our battle against it.
sentences.cn: 要重视和加强反恐怖斗争.

words.tran_cn: 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的
加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的
强化；加剧；激烈化；增强明暗度
增强器；增强剂；使更激烈之物
强度，烈度；加强，加剧；紧张
强度；强烈；[电子] 亮度；紧张

trans.tran_en: to increase in degree or strength, or to make something do this
to increase in degree or strength, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: （使）增强，（使）加剧，增加（照片图象）的对比度，变强或增强
